M

Main - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper
Entry point for my word alignment EM-algorithm (implementing IBM 1)
Main() - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper.Main
The main program
Map - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.hmm.log
The Mapper class for the HMM MapReduce job Assumes that probabilities are in the log probability space
Map() - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.hmm.log.Map
 
map(LongWritable, Text, Context) - Method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.hmm.log.Map
map function in the HMM MapReduce job It takes a parallel sentence and computes the Expectation step of the EM algorithm within a HMM Framework states in the HMM are the source words/their position in the sentence and the observations are the target words It outputs the following stripes: 1 - emissions: "emit from " + the source word as a key (state) and a map in which the keys are target words (observation) and a double as value 2 - initial state probabilities: "initial" as key and a map in which the keys are the source word positions (states) and a double as value 3 - transition probabilities: "transit from" + the source word position (state) as key and a map in which the keys are again the source word positions (states) and a double as value for more details see my project report
Map - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.hmm.normal
The Mapper class for the HMM MapReduce job
Map() - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.hmm.normal.Map
 
map(LongWritable, Text, Context) - Method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.hmm.normal.Map
map function in the HMM MapReduce job It takes a parallel sentence and computes the Expectation step of the EM algorithm within a HMM Framework states in the HMM are the source words/their position in the sentence and the observations are the target words It outputs the following stripes: 1 - emissions: "emit from " + the source word as a key (state) and a map in which the keys are target words (observation) and a double as value 2 - initial state probabilities: "initial" as key and a map in which the keys are the source word positions (states) and a double as value 3 - transition probabilities: "transit from" + the source word position (state) as key and a map in which the keys are again the source word positions (states) and a double as value for more details see my project report
Map - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log
The Mapper class for the IBM1 MapReduce job Assumes that probabilities are in the log probability space
Map() - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log.Map
 
map(LongWritable, Text, Context) - Method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log.Map
map function in the IBM1 MapReduce job It takes a parallel sentence and computes the Expectation step of the EM algorithm It outputs the source word as a key and a pair of target word and a double as value for more details see my project report
